description: Try our easy to follow BBQ Steak with Jacket Potatoes & Garlic-Crumbed Tomatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Steak,Tree nut free,Egg free,Tomato,Beef,Summer,Potato,Peanut free,Father's Day
name: BBQ Steak with Jacket Potatoes & Garlic-Crumbed Tomatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 tsp dried thyme leaves (or 1 tsp fresh thyme leaves)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sauces, maple syrup, sugar and mustard in a shallow ceramic dish. Cut beef into 7 steaks and place in marinade. Turn to coat well. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Put potatoes on an oven tray and prick. Sprinkle with salt. Bake for 45 minutes or until soft.
Put tomatoes on a lined baking tray. Combine breadcrumbs, garlic, oil and thyme in a bowl. Sprinkle over tomato. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden.

Remove steaks from fridge and bring to room temperature. Heat a barbecue grill or char-grill pan over medium-high heat. When hot, add steaks and cook for 3 minutes each side, for medium rare, or until cooked to your liking. Transfer a steak and a potato to each serving plate. Cut a small cross on the top of potatoes. Spoon sour cream on top and sprinkle with chives. Place 2 tomato halves onto the plates. Sprinkle with baby rocket. Serve.
